title: Danny Vroom: Gay in the Fast Lane
description: Racecar driver Danny Vroom has always lived his life in the fast lane. After meeting Business Man Greg, Danny finally finds the courage to slow down and be his true self.
quote: The truth will set you fast.
altHero: Danny Vroom standing by the open door of his race car looking at the crowd
alt1: Danny Vroom racing in his car
alt2: Danny holding up a big trophy as confetti rains down
alt3: two other racers, beat up and on fire, look on in admiration
alt4: beyond the reporters, Business Man Greg is down on one knee with a diamond ring in one hand and a martini in the other
